title: Obscure.Collection.Steam.Rip-R.G.GameWorks
description:
Obscure.Collection.Steam.Rip-R.G.GameWorks


Released: March 10, 2014
Genre: Action / Adventure
Developer: Hydravision Entertainment
Publisher: Mighty Rocket Studio
Platform: PC
Publication Type: License [Steam-Rip]
Language: English, German, French, Italian, Spanish
Language: English, German, French, Italian, Spanish
Tablet:Skidrow

Minimum	System requirement
Operating system: XP / Windows Vista / Windows 7 / Windows 8
Processor: Pentium III 1 GHz
RAM:512 MB RAM
HDD:2,5 GB / 2,6 GB
Video:DirectX 9.0c compatible 3D card with 128 MB

In one unremarkable school suddenly disappears without a trace and the student. 
His friends decide to find out the reasons for the strange disappearance of his 
classmates and go in search of. What they discover will forever remain in their 
memory as the worst of nightmares ...

Two years have passed since, as fiends attacked ordinary high school, being on 
call Director-maniac. Brave teenagers fought to the bitter end, and many died in 
an unequal battle. Survivors chose to forget about what happened and the nightmare 
came to the university. But a terrible revenge is not far off. The experiment with the 
mysterious black plants appeared on the university campus, it was found a substance 
that causes intense visions. Before heroes guess, than in reality fraught with lessons 
in botany, magnificently blossoming flowers of evil and infernal ripe berries.

1] Run Setup exe
2] select 'Install'
3] click Browse and select where to install
4] click Install and install the game
5] copy and replace the content of the folder 'NoDVD' to the game installation directory
6] play from shortcut created on desktop.
7] Enjoy!
